name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Duke - Nuke that data with one click

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear all browsing data with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
⚠️ This extension MAY increase SSD wear ⚠️
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Clear all of the following with one click:
 • Websites' app caches
 • The browser's cache
 • Cache storage
 • The browser's cookies
 • The browser's download list
 • Websites' file systems
 • The browser's history
 • Websites' IndexedDB data
 • Websites' local storage data
 • Plugins' data
 • Service Workers
 • Websites' WebSQL data

Key features:
 • Zero configuration
 • Only ONE permission - "chrome.browsingData"
   Which can ONLY be used to REMOVE browsing data
   as stated in the official developer
   documentation here:
   https://developer.chrome.com/extensions/browsingData

NOTE:
Passwords and form data is NOT removed because their
storage is optional.
